About us:
We catch fish.

Norway Bay Fishing is the best fishing charter business on the Ottawa River for absolutely everybody to enjoy. Whether you are new to fishing, or if you are a long time fisherman and want to get the chance to catch some monster fish. We can do it all. Norway Bay Fishing is ran by myself Noa and my Co-angler Sam. Both me and Sam have many years of fishing experience and guiding experience and we will put you on fish guarantee.

Located in big fish territory.

Norway Bay Fishing is located on the Ottawa River in Norway Bay Quebec. We are less than a hour drive away from downtown Ottawa between the 2 towns of Quyon and Shawville in the Pontiac Quebec area. Hop in the car and you will be out fishing before you know it.

All the proof you need.

Here are some pictures of our most prized catches. With a large variation of fish species we catch trophy sized fish of all kinds. In our opinion, hooking into a big Muskie is one of the most thrilling things someone can experience.

Find your perfect trip.

With our 3 packages we bring you the greatest fishing experiences for by far the lowest prices. If none of the packages suit you exactly, get in contact with us so we can accommodate to what you want.
